title: Ive broken my screen and display affected. Want to get it repaired and remain waterproof
content:
My 1 year old threw my phone accidentally into a metal fire grate and it shattered the screen and the display has 2 horizontal lines accross it. Beneath the line it goes crazy flashing a green light across the whole display intermittently at random. 
Its basically on the fritz. 
I am in regional australia and want to get it repaired but retain its waterproof rating. Guess ill need to mail it somewhere? any advice?
